reviews.review_msg: Great prof. Very helpful and clear in her lectures. The class is very eye-opening and is one everyone should take. The assignments and exams are fair. Make sure you take notes during lectures.

Helen is an excellent professor. The course material is interesting.  Exams and assignments are fair.  Her teaching style is clear and the way she delivers her material is also excellent.  Overall, this is a great course.  Highly recommended!

Helen is an excellent prof, one of the best at SFU!  Her PowerPoint slides were easy to read, eye-catching, and the movies in class were entertaining and relevant to the class.  Fair and generous marker.  I got 100% on the midterm and didn't study.  She's amazing -- I have her next semester for GDST 301.  Can't wait!

She is a great teacher, and the course is pretty easy. I got my first A in her class midterm! You can relate the course material to your own life so it's not difficult to understand at all. GDST200 is a fantastic elective course and I would recommend it to everyone.

Helen is a great professor and I highly recommend taking a class with her. Interesting topic, fair workload and easy marking make this class a pleasure. If you do the readings every week (which are really interesting and relevent) you will have no problem getting a good grade.
Very casual atmosphere with Helen, she's very knowledgeable and down-to-earth.  Good material as well, very interesting class and good supplements - we watched lots of movies!
so down to earth - made an already interesting topic even easier to learn. take a class with her if you can!

an AWESOME chick!  happy, fair, open... if you get a chance, take a class with this woman! the only problem i had with her was that she used too few visuals and it was easy to lose focus (especially at 9:30am!)
She covers the topic very well in the time that she has.
BEst proff I've ever had. Wasn't to sure about the class in the beginning but I am totally glad that I was able to learn from such a talent and magnificant women.
she is a great proff. she is so knowledgable adn made the class so much more interesting then I thought it would be in the first place. HELEN YOU ROCK!!!
Ridiculously knowledgable about the field of gender studies. Amazing at creating a comfortable environment to discuss difficult issues. A snappy dresser as well.
wow! never had a prof before like her who is so helpful, and nice too!
